summary.para: An optional type description used with . It is used to specify constraints on the set of values which can be deserialized.
Specifies a function which can be used to compare . If NULL, a default comparer is used.

Because has a partial ordering, not all durations can be unambiguously compared (for example, 1 month and 30 days). The default comparer function can compare durations that specify years and months (but no other components), or durations that specify no years or months (but any other component).
